hero.heading: Gabirana twitegereze isi w'iyigishwa
hero.description: Menya amasomo y'impuguke mu ikoranabuhanga, mu bucuruzi, mu buhanzi n'ibindi. Kuramo kandi wige mu buryo bwakugenewe, aho ariho hose, igihe icyo aricyo cyose.
hero.catalogDescription: Amasomo y'irembo arenga 500 aboneka hanze ya interineti
hero.learnOffline: Iga utari kuri interineti, aho ariho hose

dataScience.title: Ubumenyi bw'amakuru
dataScience.description: Menya gusesengura amakuru no gukorera kuri mashine

completionRate.title: Igipimo cyo kurangiza kw'amasomo
completionRate.description: Uburyo bwacu bwo kwiga utari kuri interineti bufasha abanyeshuri kurangiza amasomo nubwo bakoresha interineti idahagije, bikabyara igipimo cyiza cyo kurangiza amasomo.

expertLed.title: Amasomo y'impuguke
expertLed.description: Amasomo yateguwe n'abanyamwuga mu nganda n'impuguke zo muri kaminuza

learningAccess.title: Kubona inyigisho
learningAccess.description: Kuramo rimwe, wige igihe icyo aricyo cyose, aho ariho hose, n'igihe utari kuri interineti

activeStudents.title: Abanyeshuri bakoresha
activeStudents.description: Winjire mu muryango wacu w'isi yose w'abiga burundu

satisfactionRate.title: Igipimo cy'uko abantu bashimishijwe
satisfactionRate.description: Amanota meza ku buryo buhoraho mu byiciro byose by'amasomo

offlineFeature.heading: Uburyo bwo kwiga nta ngorane
offlineFeature.description: Kuramo amasomo kandi ukomeze kwiga utari kuri interineti. Nta guhagarara, nta mpamvu. Porogaramu yacu ihuza aho wageze igihe wongera kuba kuri interineti.

downloadCourses.title: Kuramo amasomo yose
downloadCourses.description: Bika amashusho, ibikoresho n'isuzuma kugira ngo ubyifashishe utari kuri interineti

autoSync.title: Guhuza byikora
autoSync.description: Ihuza byoroshye aho wageze igihe wongera kuba kuri interineti

offlineFeature.offlineModeActive: Uburyo bwo gukora utari kuri interineti burakora

details.heading: Dufata iby'ingenzi byose
details.description: Urubuga rwacu rwateguwe rwita ku rugendo rwawe rwo kwiga, rugufasha ibikoresho byose n'ibigendanye nawo kugira ngo ugere ku ntego.

expertCurriculum.title: Integanyanyigisho y'impuguke
expertCurriculum.description: Buri somo ryateguwe neza n'impuguke mu nganda n'abarimu mu guhana ubumenyi n'ubushobozi byiza kandi bya vuba.

offlineLearning.title: Kwiga utari kuri interineti yuzuye
offlineLearning.description: Kuramo amasomo yose harimo amashusho, ibibazo n'ibikoresho kugira ngo wige aho ariho hose, nubwo haba nta interineti.

certifications.title: Ibyemezo Byizwe
certifications.description: Bona impamyabushobozi zemewe mu nganda iyo urangije amasomo kugira ngo wongere urutonde rw'imirimo yawe n'impamyabumenyi y'umwuga.

support.title: Ubufasha mu kwiga 24/7
support.description: Itsinda ryacu rihoraho n'ingaga z'abanyamuryango bigufasha kutaguma mu bibazo, Bitanga ubufasha igihe ukeneye.

auth.title: EduAfri
auth.description: Bona inyigisho hanze ya interineti muri Afurika
auth.offlineMode: Uburyo bwo Gukora Utari kuri Interineti

signIn.useOfflineMode: Koresha uburyo bwo gukora utari kuri interineti
signIn.failureMessage: Kwinjira utari kuri interineti byanze. Reba imyirondoro yawe cyangwa urebe konti nshya utari kuri interineti.

signUp.useOfflineMode: Koresha uburyo bwo gukora utari kuri interineti
signUp.successMessage: Reba imeri yawe kugira ngo ubone ihuza ryo kwemeza.
signUp.offlineSuccessMessage: Konti yawe yo gukoresha utari kuri interineti yaremwe neza
signUp.failureMessage: Kurema konti yo gukoresha utari kuri interineti byanze. Imeri ishobora kuba isanzwe ikoreshwa.

dashboard.yourLearningJourney: Komeza urugendo rwawe rwo kwiga na EduAfri
dashboard.recommendedSectionDesc: Bishingiye ku byo ukunda n'aho ugeze

courses.title: Ibikubiyemo Inyigisho
courses.description: Reba kandi ukuremo amasomo, ibiganiro, n'ibibazo

downloads.title: Byakuwe
downloads.description: Bona ibikubiyemo offline igihe cyose, aho ariho hose

sync.title: Imimerere ya Sync
sync.description: Ibyo wakuye byahurijwe hamwe kandi biteguye gukoreshwa offline
sync.syncWhenOnline: Ibikubiyemo byawe bizahurizwa hamwe mu buryo bwikora igihe uzaba online

messages.needOnlineToRemove: Ugomba kuba uri kuri interineti kugira ngo ukureho ibikuwe

profile.title: Igenamiterere ry'Umwirondoro
profile.description: Gucunga ibyo ukunda ku konti yawe

clearDownloads.title: Gusiba Ibikubiyemo Byakuwe
clearDownloads.description: Kuraho ibikubiyemo byose byakuwe kugira ngo ubone umwanya

syncData.title: Guhuza Ibikubiyemo
syncData.description: Guhuza aho ugeze no gukura ibikubiyemo bishya

search.title: Gushaka Ibikubiyemo
search.tryDifferent: Gerageza amagambo atandukanye cyangwa urebe ibikubiyemo byose

programming.title: Porogaramu
programming.description: Iterambere rya Web, Mobile na Software

content.offlineDescription: Ibi bikubiyemo ntabwo byarakurwa kugira ngo bikoreshwe offline.
content.refreshDescription: Kwerekana ibikubiyemo bishya biva kuri seriveri.
content.refreshOfflineDescription: Ntushobora gusahura ibikubiyemo mu buryo bwa offline.
content.quizDescription: Ibi bibazo birimo ibibazo {count}. Subiza ibibazo byose kugira ngo urangize.
